QuestData.Title: Human Infestation
QuestData.Description: This mine was once the heart of Alliance mining operations in Hillsbrad. It now serves as a breeding ground for our loyal spiders, though, the humans still occupy it - in a way.$B$B<Keyton grins.>$B$BBut onto business! Warden Stillwater has called for more workers at the Sludge Fields. I want you to enter the mine with these shackles and capture Hillsbrad humans for labor in the fields.$B$BBreak them out of their web paralysis and beat them into submission before you use the shackles.
QuestData.CompletionText: We mustn't keep the warden waiting!
QuestData.RewardText: These will do nicely. I do wonder what the warden has planned for them. Last I heard the Sludge Fields were overrun by some very bad things.
